faq.subtitle: Find out more about how CurrentSage AI can transform your content strategy.

items.question: What makes CurrentSage AI different from other AI writers?
items.answer: CurrentSage AI uniquely integrates automated real-time local/global event data and offers predictive AI SEO, going beyond basic content generation to create timely, highly optimized articles. We also provide deep, two-way CMS integration.

items.question: Who is CurrentSage AI for?
items.answer: Our primary users are digital marketing agencies (10-50 employees) and mid-size e-commerce businesses ($1M-$5M revenue) who need to scale high-quality, SEO-optimized blog content efficiently.

items.question: How does the pricing work?
items.answer: We use a transparent, value-driven pay-as-you-go model. You pay $22.99 for each AI-generated blog post. There are no monthly subscriptions required for core generation.

items.question: Can I integrate CurrentSage AI with my website?
items.answer: Yes, we offer deep, two-way integration with popular CMS platforms like WordPress, allowing you to push drafts directly and streamline your publishing workflow.

items.question: How does the real-time data integration work?
items.answer: Our Live Event Engine and data streams automatically identify relevant trends, consumer behavior signals, and local/global events based on your topic and target location, suggesting ways to incorporate them into your content for maximum relevance.

items.question: Is the content truly SEO-optimized?
items.answer: Absolutely. Our predictive AI SEO analyzes top-ranking content and search intent to provide actionable guidance on structure, keywords, and on-page factors, aiming to improve your content's ranking potential.
